fn test_ldxh_all() {
    test_interpreter_and_jit_asm!(
        "
        mov r0, r1
        ldxh r9, [r0+0]
        be16 r9
        lsh r9, 0
        ldxh r8, [r0+2]
        be16 r8
        lsh r8, 4
        ldxh r7, [r0+4]
        be16 r7
        lsh r7, 8
        ldxh r6, [r0+6]
        be16 r6
        lsh r6, 12
        ldxh r5, [r0+8]
        be16 r5
        lsh r5, 16
        ldxh r4, [r0+10]
        be16 r4
        lsh r4, 20
        ldxh r3, [r0+12]
        be16 r3
        lsh r3, 24
        ldxh r2, [r0+14]
        be16 r2
        lsh r2, 28
        ldxh r1, [r0+16]
        be16 r1
        lsh r1, 32
        ldxh r0, [r0+18]
        be16 r0
        lsh r0, 36
        or r0, r1
        or r0, r2
        or r0, r3
        or r0, r4
